room_title: Escape room "Neverland" by Once Upon An Escape in Las Vegas
review: Neverland was awesome! Definitely needed all of us (6) to escape. Fun for teens and adults. I wouldn't reccomend for young kids just because they won't be able to get a lot of the clues.

room_title: Escape room "Neverland" by Once Upon An Escape in Las Vegas
review: did NEVERLAND, it was really fun! That room was for sure a challenge but we had a wonderful time. for sure want to try the other rooms some day.

room_title: Escape room "Neverland" by Once Upon An Escape in Las Vegas
review: I had a great time with the people I went with. MJ was a great host and the new finding Neverland escape room is a must try! You and whoever you bring will have a great experience here, totally worth it.
